embeds.description:
# Choose a Race
### Wood Elf
As a wood elf, you have keen senses and intuition, and
your fleet feet carry you quickly and stealthily through
your native forests. This category includes the wild elves
(grugach) of Greyhawk and the Kagonesti of Dragonlance, as well as the races called wood elves in Greyhawk
and the Forgotten Realms. In Faerûn, wood elves (also
called wild elves, green elves, or forest elves) are reclusive and distrusting of non-elves.

fields.name: • Darkvision
fields.value: *Elves can see in dim light within 60 feet as if it were bright light and in darkness as if it were dim light. They can't discern colors in darkness, only shades of gray.*

fields.name: • Keen Senses
fields.value: *Proficiency in the Perception skill, representing their heightened awareness.*

fields.name: • Fey Ancestry
fields.value: *Advantage on saving throws against being charmed, and magic cannot put them to sleep. This stems from their fey heritage.*

fields.name: • Trance
fields.value: *Instead of sleeping for 8 hours, elves meditate deeply for 4 hours to gain the same benefits as a long rest. They remain semi-conscious during this time, so they are harder to surprise.*

fields.name: • Mask of the Wild
fields.value: *Can attempt to hide even when lightly obscured by natural phenomena like foliage, heavy rain, or mist.*

fields.name: • Size
fields.value: *Elves range from under 5 to over 6 feet tall and have slender builds. Your size is Medium.*
